name: HideandSeek
0:
”Alexa, open Hide and Seek”
”Alexa, launch Hide and Seek”
”Alexa, start Hide and Seek”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hide n seek
des:
This is Alexa's premiere Hide and Seek experience, where you get to hide, and Alexa tries to find you. Pick your best hiding spot in the same room as your Alexa device, and remember to speak loudly so she can hear you. If she can't guess where you are after three tries, then you win!

If there are any additional hiding spots that you would like added to this skill, please leave a review and let me know so that I may add them. Thank you, and enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
